ninjachef.flavors.flavor module¶

Writing flavors.

Helpful things for flavor writers.

class ninjachef.flavors.flavor.Flavor[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract base class for flavors.

name¶

str

The name of the flavor, to distinguish it from other flavors.

This is intended as a convenience for flavor writers, so that they may verify their flavor is (superficially) correctly implemented.

copy(name=None)[source]¶

Deep-copy (aka clone) object.

Parameters:name (Optional[str]) – New flavor name to give to the copy.
Returns:Flavor
exe_name(name)[source]¶

Map path to an appropriate executable file.

lib_name(name)[source]¶

Map path to an appropriate library file.

ninja_rules(ninja, recipe)[source]¶

Emit Ninja file rules.

Parameters:
  • ninja (ninja_syntax.Writer) – The writer to emit to.
  • recipe (Recipe) – A recipe to obtain rule names.
Returns:

None
object_file(path)[source]¶

Map path to an appropriate object file.

variables(variables, component)[source]¶

Prepare ninja variables.

Parameters:
  • variables (Dict[str, Any]) – A mapping of the form {'defines': set, 'includes': list, 'cflags': list, 'lflags': list, 'lib_paths': list, 'libs': list} where set is a set of str, and list are lists of str. All keys must be present.
  • component (Tuple[str, str]) – A tuple of the name of the project with the name of one of its components.

Returns: Dict[str, str]: variables suitable for use with Writer.build().
